titleStmt.title: Whereas the old and implacable enemy having for some time before the restoring of this Parliament formed a design for the bringing in of Charles Stewart ... by the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
Declares royalists Randolph Eggerton, Thomas Middleton, George Booth and Robert Werden traitors.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
